testcase.classname: Create a new Branch in the system
testcase.name: Navigate to Branch Page verify if user is able to create a new branch
testcase.system-out: Given user is logged in to the application with username "admin" and password "admin".passed When user clicks on Branch Link.............................................passed And clicks on create new Branch button and enters "PHYSICS" and "B1"........passed Then user should be able to create a new Branch with "PHYSICS" and "B1".....passed
